roles.title: Lead SWE (AI/ML, Web & Mobile) – YouDescribeX
bullets: Promoted to lead engineering efforts across AI/ML, web, and mobile platforms, overseeing end-to-end system design, implementation, and deployment.
Led a cross-functional team of researchers, engineers, and accessibility specialists to deliver new features with biweekly releases while maintaining a crash rate below 1%.
Architected multi-platform accessibility features across web, iOS, and Android apps, ensuring scalability and consistent user experience.
Defined technical roadmap and mentored junior developers, fostering best practices in AI integration, mobile development, and accessibility-first design.
Key Achievements: Elevated YouDescribeX from research prototype to production-ready platform adopted by 40+ blind/low-vision users in pilot testing.

roles.title: Research Assistant – YouDescribeX
bullets: Developed YouDescribeX (App Store) to improve accessibility for blind and visually impaired users; optimized API and client flows for 15% faster page loads and 20% higher 30-day retention.
Integrated a new backend inference path for AI-generated descriptions by updating API and service layers while maintaining backward compatibility.
Built ML pipelines for generating and refining audio description prompts; prompt tuning and ranking methods improved relevance by 18%.
Implemented Infobot for in-video Q&A with temporal grounding; achieved a top-3 hit rate of 86% on a 300-question benchmark.
Tested accessibility with NVDA and VoiceOver, achieving 100% keyboard navigation coverage and AA+ contrast compliance.
Conducted usability sessions with 25 BVI users, reducing task time for common actions by 28%.

roles.title: Lead – Data & Compliance Squad
bullets: Led development of an AI-powered accessibility analysis platform with agent workflows and real-time evaluation across WCAG 2.0/2.1/2.2 standards.
Expanded accessibility rules and analysis logic to achieve 100% WCAG 2.1 coverage.
Added multi-standard compliance support (EEA, ADA, AODA) with unified scoring and reporting.
Implemented performance optimizations reducing end-to-end analysis runtime by 60–70%.
Key Achievements: Delivered a production-ready compliance analysis system adopted as the primary accessibility evaluation workflow.

roles.title: Agentic AI Engineer Intern
bullets: Built a RAG-backed vector knowledge base and integrated versioned compliance selection for accessibility analysis.
Integrated agent workflows into 4 production microservices, maintaining 99.9% uptime and p95 latency under 300ms.
Automated multi-step audit pipelines, reducing review cycle time from 15 min → 9 min and saving ~120 hrs/quarter.
Developed monitoring dashboards to track agent execution and system health, reducing MTTR by 30%.
Improved dashboard UX and assistant experience (KASHA AI Assistant) with supporting architecture and user-flow documentation.
Key Achievements: Shipped and stabilized agentic workflows used in production accessibility audits.

company: Northeastern University – Khoury College of Computer Sciences

roles.title: Teaching Assistant – CS 5520 Mobile Application Development
bullets: Mentored 30+ graduate students on Android development (Java, Firebase, MVVM), contributing to an average 15% improvement in assignment scores.
Built Python-based auto-graders and grading rubrics, reducing grading time by 40% and standardizing feedback turnaround within 48 hours.
Led weekly labs on Android lifecycle, networking, and local storage; 90% of students shipped fully functional final projects.
Worked with faculty to redesign two major assignments aligned with industry patterns (offline-first design, push notifications), increasing completion rates by 12 percentage points.
Key Achievements: Improved course delivery efficiency and student project quality through tooling, structured mentoring, and assignment design.

roles.title: Technical Product Development Intern
bullets: Implemented and optimized cross-platform mobile features in Flutter for iOS and Android, improving app startup time by ~400ms and reducing crash rate by 35%.
Contributed to feature planning and prioritization by translating user feedback and product requirements into shipped functionality.
Owned QA testing across 6 production releases, creating and executing 60+ manual and automated test cases to increase regression coverage to 80%.
Analyzed competitor apps and app store trends to inform feature iterations, supporting releases that reached 65% MAU adoption within 30 days.
Key Achievements: Shipped and validated 6 production releases while supporting growth of an AI-powered internship-matching platform used by 200+ fellows.

roles.title: Graduate BIM Engineer
bullets: Produced and delivered 12+ Building Information Models (BIM) using Revit, coordinating multidisciplinary inputs and achieving 99% design specification accuracy.
Key Achievements: Promoted from intern to full-time engineer within 12 months.
